lines: There are always new things to find out if you go looking for them.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc981e428>

lines: By mutual confidence and mutual aid great deeds are done, and great discoveries made.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9815648>

lines: Discovery is seeing what everybody else has seen, and thinking what nobody else has thought.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc982d900>

lines: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover is yourself.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc98266a0>

lines: The world is incomprehensibly beautiful—an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc983e6b0>

lines: Nature brings solace in all troubles.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc98358d0>

lines: The wilderness holds answers to questions we have not yet learned to ask.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc985b738>

lines: An early morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc986f648>

lines: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9862808>

lines: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc987a020>

lines: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9871ba0>

lines: May your walls know joy, may every room hold laughter, and every window open to great possibility.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc98c98a0>

lines: Laughter is proof of hope.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc98c2140>

lines: Laugh my friend, for laughter ignites a fire within the pit of your belly and awakens your being.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc993b5e0>

lines: Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9934b00>

lines: To be able to look back upon one's life in satisfaction, is to live twice.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc995cc68>

lines: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc997ee30>

lines: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9975290>

lines: To live a life fulfilled reflect on the things you have with gratitude.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc99abea8>

lines: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc99a4428>

lines: Promise yourself to be just as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc99da320>

lines: Those who are lifting the world upward and onward are those who encourage more than criticize.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc99fe068>

lines: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc99f47e8>

lines: Mind. Body. Soul. These are the three things self-care is all about.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a1c090>

lines: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a11f50>

lines: There’s only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that’s your own self.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a382b8>

lines: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a4ed88>

lines: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a49068>

lines: We must take care of our families wherever we find them.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a441a8>

lines: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a6e930>

lines: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a69890>

lines: All it takes is one good person to restore hope.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fc9a60470>

lines: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
author: <Author:0x00007f5fca4ea1e8>
